metadata.name: Suspicious Schtasks Execution AppData Folder
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a schtask that executes a file from C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Local

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/create')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/ru')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tr')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nt aut')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' system '))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\temp\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('teamviewer_.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tn tvinstallrestore'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a schtask that executes a file from C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Local
